about_the_game:
Bring Me Hope is an adventure RPG, drawing inspiration from titles such as Undertale and Enter The Gungeon. This is a story rich experience about love, life, and connection. Sink into the unique and bittersweet life of Alium.

Key Features

  • A Handmade Experience - Created with love and care put into every pixel.

  • Overcome the Odds - High stakes and fast paced. Parry, dodge, or overpower your enemies.

  • Evolve and Experiment - Set grass on fire, electrify wet enemies, or use oil to create an explosive chain reaction. Items can interact with fluids, objects, and enemies leading to unexpected results.

  • Heartfelt Story - An emotional adventure that will take you from the bottom of the ocean through cities and between planes of existence.

  • Fiendish Foes - Powerful and unique boss fights will challenge you to hone your skills and formulate new strategies.

  • More than Meets the Eye - Discover an unreasonable amount of hidden bosses and areas to explore.

  • Customize your gameplay - Modify your game to fit your preferences! Minimize screenshake, max out the difficulty, and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Various integrated graphics cards will not run the game and specific anti-virus programs are known to cause issues
